label: ABC6D2_mC40_15_e_e_3f_f-002
title: Diopside [CaMg(SiO$_{3}$)$_{2}$, $S4_{1}$] Structure
comments:
(Finger, 1976) list the two (4e) positions as 'M1' and 'M2', and both are mixtures of calcium and magnesium.  For visual clarity we desigated the first (4e) position as calcium and the second as magnesium. 
 This structure has the same AFLOW label, ABC6D2\_mC40\_15\_e\_e\_3f\_f, as \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC6D2_mC40_15_e_e_3f_f-001}{esseneite}. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
